javadoc: FileSystemListenerList maintains a list of FileSystemListener's. This class, acting as a FileSystemListener, simply relays each callback to all FileSystemListener's within its list. Employs either a synchronous and asynchronous notification mechanism.

name: FileSystemListenerList
comment:
FileSystemListenerList maintains a list of FileSystemListener's.
 This class, acting as a FileSystemListener, simply relays each callback to
 all FileSystemListener's within its list.  Employs either a synchronous 
 and asynchronous notification mechanism.
